entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 12:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -8.8°C

Humidity: 85 %

Dewpoint: -10.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming north 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
